content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM MS Dynamics 365 and Power Platform practice has successfully delivered its services to more than 50+ customers from a variety of domains: insurance, banking and finance, life science and healthcare, high-tech, etc. A picture is worth a thousand words!  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more details re. selected projects, please visit\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLEAPPMS/Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLEAPPMS/MS+Dynamics+365+and+Power+Platform+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":486059,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ab33af8d-995f-4e27-b085-316fd29f2204/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ab33af8d-995f-4e27-b085-316fd29f2204/Picture7.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture7.png\",\"name\":\"Picture7.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ab33af8d-995f-4e27-b085-316fd29f2204\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":943,\"height\":669},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
